amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in Part B of House Report 116-32 to direct the Department of Justice to establish an interagency working group to study existing Federal surveys and reporting programs on sexual violence, and to make recommendations on how to harmonize such efforts for improved coordination and data collection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A016) offered by Ms. Meng.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Meng amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
